room.name: A Long Tunnel
room.description: You encounter some rapids as you enter this tunnel cut out of the mountains by the river.

direction.general_description: There appear to be some bars here, making passage to the west difficult.

room.name: A Long Tunnel
room.description: The tunnel branches off north.

room.name: A Long Tunnel
room.description: The tunnel branches off south.

room.name: A Tunnel Intersection
room.description: The tunnel branches off to the north and south.

room.name: An Underground Lake
room.description: You are floating on a jet-black underground lake fed by dripping water and lime from above. The tunnel continues to the east and the river leads back west. Leading upwards to the northwest is a roughly hewn hallway.

room.name: A Long Narrow Tunnel
room.description: The tunnel rises sharply to the east. Another narrow tunnel leads away to the north.

room.name: A Wide Tunnel
room.description: The tunnel continues east and west. To the east the tunnel dives down into a bright light. A small passage way opens to the north.

room.name: The Cave-In
room.description: You stand at the edge of a large pile of rubble created from the last rockslide.

direction.general_description: You can easily slide down the rocks without getting hurt.

room.name: At The Foot Of The Rubble
room.description: You are at the bottom of a large pile of rubble. A tunnel branches off to the north and east.

room.name: A Cave Entrance
room.description: You stand in the middle of a large and beautiful cave. A path leads deeper into the darkness.

direction.general_description: You look down into the cave. Bones are strewn about everywhere.

room.name: A Giant Cave
room.description: This cavern overwhelms you. The walls and ceiling seem miles away. Bones of previous adventurers lie strewn on the cavern floor. There is a passage that spirals downwards in the northeast corner of the cavern.

direction.general_description: The passageway spirals down into the gloom.

room.name: A Narrow Bend
room.description: The tunnel turns to the south and west.

room.name: A Large Cave
room.description: You are standing in a large cave. Many furs are spread out on the floor.

room.name: A Damp Hallway
room.description: The walls here are extremely damp, as well as the floor.

direction.general_description: You hear drops of water.

room.name: An Underground Pool
room.description: You are wading in a knee deep pool of lime-water.

room.name: A Damp Hallway
room.description: The walls of the tunnel are extremely damp here. The tunnel leads sharply upwards to the south as it starts to get narrow.

direction.general_description: You hear drops of water.

room.name: A Narrow Crawlway
room.description: This crawlway is just big enough for a human to crawl through or a halfling to walk through.

direction.general_description: You smell the fragrant odor of fungus.

room.name: A Large Cavern
room.description: You have entered a very large cavern. The rock formations would amaze almost any dwarf.

room.name: A Fungus Patch
room.description: As you walk through the fungus patch, you are shot at by many millions of spores. You can hardly breathe.

direction.general_description: The fragrant smell of fungus spores continues to the east.

room.name: The Fungus Path
room.description: As you walk along the path, millions of spores are shot at you. It is difficult to breathe.

direction.general_description: A giant mushroom temple stands to the south.
The fragrant smell of spores continues to the west.

room.name: The Fungus Temple
room.description: You find yourself standing inside of a giant mushroom. The inside is decorated in the fashion of a temple.

room.name: A Sloping Passage
room.description: You follow a path sloping down from the fungus temple.

room.name: A Sloping Passage
room.description: You are on a path that gently slopes up from the underground pool.

direction.general_description: You hear sounds of trickling water.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west. The hole which you tumbled out of is too high for you to reach.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north-east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west. You spy a narrow dirt trail leading away to the west into the foothills.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
A small dirt trail leads off to the west where it joins a large clay road some distance away.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north-east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: A Small Oasis
room.description: You stand beside a small pool of crystal-blue water bathed in the shade of a few scarce palm trees. To the north you see a small encampment stopped for the day.

direction.general_description: You see three tents and some camels hitched to a stake. Shadows moving across the tents suggest activity.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north-east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the south-east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the east, it looks enormous, even from this distance.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the east.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north-east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north-east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the south.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the south. The gates of a city lie a short distance off to the north.

direction.general_description: Some city gates stand off to the north.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. You are standing near a gigantic pyramid located a couple hundred meters west of you. From here you can sense the great evil which resides within the massive structure.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
The pyramid can be seen across the sands to the west.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north.

direction.general_description: Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the north.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north and a ruined city to the west.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the west.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north-west.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see... and a pyramid in the distance.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the south-west and a deep canyon to the east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the south-west and a deep canyon to the east. Just below you can make out a tiny ledge.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the west and a deep canyon to the east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
A rickety rope bridge stretches across the canyon... it doesn't look too safe.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the west and a deep canyon to the east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Great Eastern Desert
room.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you. A pyramid lies to the north-west and a deep canyon to the east.

direction.general_description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: A Nomad Camp
room.description: This small group of desert nomads has stopped for the day to rest and refresh themselves beside this beautiful oasis. Three tents and some camels make up the party. From within two of the tents you hear muffled voices, obviously surprised at your visit.

direction.general_description: Some camels are tied up to a mass of stakes plugged into the ground.
You see inside one of the tents a huddled mass of people, probably slaves.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: Inside A Small Tent
room.description: This is a small and simple tent with few possessions in sight. Lying here and there are young-looking men and women, possibly slaves to the leader of this band.

direction.general_description: You see the center of the nomad camp.

room.name: Beside The Camels
room.description: Here stand about ten camels, all hitched to some stakes plugged into the ground. To the east you see a small tent while to the north you see a larger, fancier tent.

direction.general_description: This tent seems to be the temporary abode of the nomad leader. You make a mental note to visit it before you leave.
In this tent there are very large men, all carrying weapons.
You see the center of the nomad camp.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

room.name: The Warriors' Tent
room.description: This tent has a few furnishings, but mainly it holds the band's protectors. They all stare at you coldly as you enter.

direction.general_description: Outside you see some peaceful camels.

room.name: The Main Tent
room.description: This tent is as lavishly decorated on the inside as it is on the outside. A fancy carpet lies on the sand and numerous baskets line the walls.

direction.general_description: You see some peaceful camels.

room.name: The Main Tent
room.description: This is where the leader of this band of nomads resides. He is definitely rich as you inspect the tapestries, baskets, and a few paintings as well.

direction.general_description: You see the entrance to this tent.

room.name: The Rickety Rope Bridge
room.description: You carefully begin to walk across the bridge, but suddenly the rope breaks and you fall... ... and fall and fall and fall ... to your death on the rocks below.

room.name: The Wind-Swept Ledge
room.description: Being very careful not to lose your balance, you look around and find that this canyon is about a half a kilometer deep. To the west is a dark cave leading under the desert sands and above you a rope bridge spans the gap.

direction.general_description: The desert sands blow down in your face.

room.name: The Cave Mouth
room.description: The air in here is MUCH cooler than outside. From the west you hear strange sounds, but can see nothing. The cave slopes down into the darkness.

direction.general_description: Outside is lighter and very windy.

room.name: The Mysterious Lair
room.description: You have stumbled upon the home of something. From the treasure haphazardly strewn about and the rotting carcasses, you would guess that this is a dragon's lair. As to what type, you can't really say. The cave narrows out into a tunnel to the west.

room.name: A Wide Tunnel
room.description: This tunnel seems to go on forever into the darkness. You carefully feel your way along the walls.

room.name: A Narrower Tunnel
room.description: The tunnel becomes very narrow and you fight to squeeze your way through. The floor seems to level off a little.

room.name: A Narrow Crack
room.description: This part of the tunnel is the hardest to move through as the walls move in to meet you.

room.name: A Small Cavern
room.description: It is dark and damp and bats hang from the ceiling. A narrow crack is in the east wall. The floor now slopes upwards.

room.name: A Small Shaft
room.description: From within this shaft you can see a narrow hole in the roof just large enough for one person. Back east is the cavern.
